Gombe is also ranked 5th in the overall rankings for SFTAS.

Kudos to Governor Muhammadu Inuwa Yahaya (Dan Majen Gombe) for providing visionary leadership that puts Gombe on a path of progress.

Gombe state received awards of excellent performance on fiscal transparency and accountability, very good performances on efficiency of public expenditure,  domestic revenue mobilisation and  on overall SFTAS disbursement linked indicators (DLI‚Äôs).
The global bank said the North East state bagged the award following reforms that have impacted positively on its fiscal transparency and accountability in public resource management.
Gombe state has won the World Bank‚Äôs states‚Äô fiscal transparency, accountability, and sustainability (SFTAS) award in four key categories. #ExploreGombe #InvestGombe https://t.co/fYV77kGyYF

It could be recalled that the Governor had at the inception of his administration procured 50 new buses to the same transport agency, with the view to consolidating its services, easing commuting, creating employment, and generating revenue for the state.

H.E, @GovernorInuwa earlier today commissioned an additional 30 new Buses procured by his administration to supplement the transport services offered by Gombe line in the state.
